entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Langley
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 07:21 AM PST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow mixed with rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with rain ending this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Snowfall amount 5 cm except 10 cm over higher terrain. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 07:23 AM PST Tuesday 28 February 2023
